org.sbrubbles.conditio

Class Signal<C extends Condition>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sbrubbles.conditio.Signal<C>
  • Type Parameters:
    C - the condition type this signal holds.

    public class Signal<C extends Condition>
extends Object
    Holds data about a specific signal invocation, including the condition.
